titles.title: Southern Nevada Readiness Center Act
A bill to provide for the conveyance of certain land in Clark County, Nevada, for use by the Nevada National Guard.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources Senate Subcommittee on Public Lands and Forests. Hearings held. With printed Hearing: S.Hrg. 110-216.

committee.name: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

bill.summary: 6/13/2007--Introduced. Southern Nevada Readiness Center Act - Permits Clark County, Nevada, to convey between 35 and 50 acres of land in Clark County to the Nevada Division of State Lands for use by the Nevada National Guard.
